Text:
The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many tongues?  
 Do we speak? 
 Does AI know what your ancestors felt?

Can bots translate  -
 The taste at the tip of a tongue? 
 The fragrance of a wildflower? 
 The caress of wrinkled hands? 
 Tears of joy; ripples of laughter?

The Internet needs 
 More of you and me 
 How many hands? 
 Hold us afloat? 
 Does AI know how compassion feels? 
 Can bots heal?

The ocean tides  
 Are rolling 
 The sea is turning 
 A little deeper 
 The ocean is rising

The sea is 
 A little bit higher. 
 And in an instant 
 The sea will Turn back.

That makes 
 It look like we're falling. 
 I hope I'm Correct
THINK: Change begins when one candle lights another.
